sentences.sContent: METHODS 4 species of Sanguisorbae and a adulterant were analysed by molecule biological technique random amplified polymorphic DNA(RAPD)and HPLC fingerprinting technique respectively.
sentences.sContent_eng: METHODS 4 species of Sanguisorbae and a adulterant were analysed by molecule biological technique random amplified polymorphic DNA(RAPD)and HPLC fingerprinting technique respectively.
sentences.sCn: 方法采用分子生物学技术随机扩增多态性DNA（RAPD）技术和HPLC技术对地榆属的4个品种及其混淆品进行分析。

remMethod.val: adult(成年人) + erant → 成年人要能辨伪存真 → 伪劣商品

words.tran: 在…中掺入杂质（adulterate的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a substance that is secretly added to food or drink, making it less pure
